projects: [{"title":"Role of CAPM in Emerging Economies","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"- Reviewed existing literature on market segmentation and analyzed the feasibility of modified CAPM Model for Emerging Economies. Took a sample of 5 countries that included India, China, Brazil, Phillipines and Nepal. - Used two tailed t-test along with time series analysis to find the correlation between alpha and beta in the Emerging Economies. - Major finding included low r square values for countries with higher friction in trade."}]
